document_data.name: Giregi Igiri
document_data.mainbody:
'''Giregi Igiri''' was a merchant who specialized in [[alchemical]] supplies and [[potion]]s in [[Port Nyanzaru]], [[Chult]], during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{Quote|I'm a very busy man. Please be brief.|Giregi Igiri}}
document_data.Personality: He was a difficult man to impress.
document_data.Activities: Giregi was a very busy merchant who worked for the [[Port Nyanzaru#Merchant Princes|merchant princes]] of Port Nyanzaru to facilitate the import and trade of alchemical reagents as well as finished potions, [[apothecary]] supplies, [[poison]]s, [[antidote]]s, and even certain foods and drinks.<ref group="note">Given the scope of goods in this list, he likely represented the interests of the merchant princes [[Jessamine]] (for ingredients and poisons), [[Kwayoth√©]] (for food and drink), and [[Wakanga O'tamu]] (for potions). He worked alongside the [[Tearah Initoo|Master of the Market]] as a point of contact for foreign merchants who sold such goods and were seeking to establish a presence in Port Nyanzaru, and he could be found at the city's [[Red Bazaar|Bazaar]].
document_data.History: During the events of the [[death curse]],{{ToA-time}} Giregi helped to organize a seasonal symposium of Port Nyanzaru merchants and artisans in order to facilitate trade into the city.
